participant_1.background:
I'm trying to balance my love of eating veggies with my desire to make people laugh.
i am in the navy.
I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
i like going to the beach.

participant_2.background:
I collect yarn from different places to use in my crochet projects.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
I am often up late at night working on my art, so I'm not a morning person.
I'm single, but I'd love to find someone to share my love of nature with
i love reading mysteries in my free time.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing good, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well too. I am a little tired, but other than that I am good.
I know how that is, I have been working a lot lately too.
What do you do for work?
I am in the navy.
Oh, that must be interesting! I have always been curious about the military.
It is, I enjoy it a lot. I get to travel a lot and meet new people.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am not very good with meeting new people, but I am sure I would get used to it.
It takes a little getting used to, but it is worth it.
I am sure it is!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to crochet, read, and go to the beach.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never been crocheting before, but I have always wanted to try it.
It is a lot of fun, and it is very relaxing.
I can see how that would be relaxing.
It is! I also love to read mysteries.
I love mysteries too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Agatha Christie books, and I also like the Nancy Drew books.
Those are both great series! I have read a few of the Nancy Drew books.
Oh, you should read more of them! They are so good!
I will have to check them out.
You won't be disappointed.
I am sure I won't be.
I am glad we are having this conversation. It is nice to talk to someone who likes the same things I do.
Me too! I am glad we met
